```{r}

library(qrcode)

link <- "https://us-east-1.quicksight.aws.amazon.com/sn/accounts/535362115856/dashboards/a10b7515-63c9-4cb9-8774-8a34f27e4ffd?directory_alias=vcu-pgx-analysis"

qr_code <- qr_code(link)

plot(qr_code)
dev.off()
```
